Troféu 808 Renault Alpine A110 1800 1973 Rallye du Maroc Winner B. Darniche/A. Mahé

Purchased: 2012

Alpines destroyed the other manufacturers in the inaugural season of the WRC winning 6 of the 13 rounds. The next most successful (Fiat) won only 2 and others won only 1. This was win #3 for Alpine and the first for Darniche & Mahé.

A nice offering from Troféu but the tires look to be way oversized to me. A minor nit is the decals for door handles.
